dc:title: They Knew Him In The Breaking of Bread
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for money to support the growing breadlines. Describes the lines, cost of feeding so many, the help they receive, and prayers to St. Joseph. Reminds readers that their gifts put them in Christian solidarity with the breadline and what is done for the men is done for Him.
